alert.note: Alert for Coastal Taylor (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 4:10PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Taylor County through 500 PM EDT... At 410 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles northwest of Perry to 19 miles east of St. Marks. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Perry, Pinland, Iddo, Secotan, Boyd, Adams Beach, Scanlon, Econfina, Dekle Beach, Lake Bird, Foley, Blue Springs, Perry-Foley Airport, Bucell Junction, Athena, Hampton Springs, Shady Grove, Fenholloway and Jug Island. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
